#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t, x1, y1, x2, y2, p1, q1, p2, q2, r1, s1, r2, s2;
    long int ar1, ar2, ar, a;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
        cin >> p1 >> q1 >> p2 >> q2;
        r1 = max(x1, p1);
        s1 = max(y1, q1);
        r2 = min(x2, p2);
        s2 = min(y2, q2);
        ar1 = (x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
        ar2 = (p2-p1)*(q2-q1);
        if(r1<r2 && s1<s2)
        {
            ar = (r2-r1)*(s2-s1);
            a = ar1 + ar2 - ar;
        }
        else
            a = ar1 + ar2;
        cout << a << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
